briefdescription.para: Map with list of StateDerivativePartialsMaps, with state type as key.

detaileddescription.para: List partials of state derivative models from which the variational equations are set up. The key is the type of dynamics for which partials are taken, the values are StateDerivativePartialsMap (see StateDerivativePartialsMap definition for details)

briefdescription.para: Map of start entry in sensitivity matrix of each type of estimated dynamics.

memberdef.type: std::map< IntegratedStateType, std::vector< std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void(Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd >) > > > >
memberdef.definition: std::map< IntegratedStateType, std::vector< std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void( Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd > ) > > > > tudat::propagators::VariationalEquations::statePartialList_
memberdef.name: statePartialList_

briefdescription.para: List of all functions returning current partial derivative w.r.t. a current dynamical state.

detaileddescription.para: List of all functions returning current partial derivative w.r.t. a current dynamical state (map key). The vector entries correspond to the entries in the outer vector of StateDerivativePartialsMaps in stateDerivativePartialList_. The multimaps inside the vector provide the functions (as values) adding the partials to a given matrix block and the start column and number of columns in matrix partial (as keys).

memberdef.type: std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void(Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd >) > >::iterator
memberdef.definition: std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void( Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd > ) > >::iterator tudat::propagators::VariationalEquations::statePartialIterator_
memberdef.name: statePartialIterator_

briefdescription.para: Pre-defined iterator for efficiency.
Vector of pair providing indices of column blocks of variational equations to add to other column blocks.

detaileddescription.para:
Vector of pair providing indices of column blocks of variational equations to add to other column blocks, which is needed by the hierarchical estimation fo dynamics. The second pair entry is the start of the column block (of size 3) to where it should be copied. The first entry denotes from where it should be copied.
setTranslationalStatePartialFrameScalingFunctions

briefdescription.para: Functions returning inertia tensors of bodies, to be used for rotational variational equations.

memberdef.type: std::map< IntegratedStateType, std::vector< std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void(Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd >) > > > >
memberdef.definition: std::map< IntegratedStateType, std::vector< std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void( Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd > ) > > > > tudat::propagators::VariationalEquations::parameterPartialList_
memberdef.name: parameterPartialList_

briefdescription.para: List of all functions returning current partial derivative w.r.t. a parameter.

detaileddescription.para: List of all functions returning current partial derivative w.r.t. a parameter. Map key denotes associated dynamics type w.r.t which partial is taken. The vector entries correspond to the entries in the outer vector of StateDerivativePartialsMaps in stateDerivativePartialList_. The multimaps inside the vector provide the functions (as values) adding the partials to a given matrix block and the start column and number of columns in matrix partial (as keys).

memberdef.type: std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void(Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd >) > >::iterator

Pre-declared iterator over all state types.

briefdescription.para: List of identifiers for points/bodies for which initial dynamical state is to be estimated.
Number of parameter values in estimation (i.e. number of columns in sensitivity matrix)
Total size of (single-arc) state vector of dynamics that is to be estimated.
Total matrix of partial derivatives of state derivatives w.r.t. current states.
Total matrix of partial derivatives of state derivatives w.r.t. parameter vectors.
Current states, in conventional representation (e.g. transformed from specific propagator) sorted per state type.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::map< IntegratedStateType, orbit_determination::StateDerivativePartialsMap > stateDerivativePartialList, const std::shared_ptr< estimatable_parameters::EstimatableParameterSet< ParameterType > > parametersToEstimate, const std::map< IntegratedStateType, int > &stateTypeStartIndices, const int currentArcIndex=-1)
memberdef.name: VariationalEquations

briefdescription.para: Constructor of variation equations class.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor of variation equations class. Since the vehicle state must be integrated along with the variational equations, an object calculating the state derivative is required.
stateDerivativePartialList
List partials of state derivative models from which the variational equations are set up. The key is the type of dynamics for which partials are taken, the values are StateDerivativePartialsMap (see StateDerivativePartialsMap definition for details)
parametersToEstimate
Object containing all parameters that are to be estimated and their current settings and values.
stateTypeStartIndices
Start index (value) in vector of propagated state for each type of state (key)
currentArcIndex
Index of current arc (-1 if not multi-arc)

briefdescription.para: Calculates matrix containing partial derivatives of state derivatives w.r.t. body state.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculates matrix containing partial derivatives of state derivatives w.r.t. body state, i.e. first matrix in right hand side of Eq. (7.45) in (Montenbruck & Gill, 2000).
Matrix containing partial derivatives of state derivative w.r.t. body state

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > &stateTransitionAndSensitivityMatrices, Eigen::Block< Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > > currentMatrixDerivative)
memberdef.name: getBodyInitialStatePartialMatrix

briefdescription.para: Function to compute the contribution of the derivatives w.r.t. current states in the variational equations.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to compute the contribution of the derivatives w.r.t. current states in the variational equations, e.g. first term in Eq. (7.45) in (Montenbruck & Gill, 2000).
stateTransitionAndSensitivityMatrices
Current combined state transition and sensitivity matric
currentMatrixDerivative
Matrix block which is to return (by reference) the given contribution to the variational equations.

briefdescription.para: Calculates matrix containing partial derivatives of state derivatives w.r.t. parameters.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculates matrix containing partial derivatives of state derivatives w.r.t. parameters, i.e. second matrix in rhs of Eq. (7.45) in (Montenbruck & Gill, 2000).
currentMatrixDerivative
Matrix block containing partial derivatives of accelerarion w.r.t. parameters (returned by reference).

memberdef.argsstring: (const double time, const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > &stateTransitionAndSensitivityMatrices, Eigen::Block< Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > > currentMatrixDerivative)
memberdef.name: evaluateVariationalEquations

briefdescription.para: Evaluates the complete variational equations.

detaileddescription.para:
Evaluates the complete variational equations at a given time and state transition matrix, sensitivity matrix and state (accessed indirectly). This function evaluates the complete Eq. (7.45) from (Montenbruck & Gill, 2000).
time
Current time
stateTransitionAndSensitivityMatrices
Combined state transition and sensitivity matrix.
currentMatrixDerivative
Variation equations result (returned by reference).

briefdescription.para: Function to clear reference/cached values of state derivative partials.

detaileddescription.para: Function to clear reference/cached values of state derivative partials, to ensure that they are all recalculated.

memberdef.argsstring: (const double currentTime, const std::unordered_map< IntegratedStateType, Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, 1 > > currentStatesPerTypeInConventionalRepresentation)
memberdef.name: updatePartials

param.type: const std::unordered_map< IntegratedStateType, Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, Eigen::Dynamic, 1 > >

briefdescription.para: This function updates all state derivative models to the current time and state.

detaileddescription.para:
This function updates all state derivative models to the current time and state.
currentTime
Time to which the system is to be updated.
currentStatesPerTypeInConventionalRepresentation
Current states, in conventional representation (e.g. transformed from specific propagator) sorted per state type.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of parameter values.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the number of parameter values (i.e. number of columns in state transition matrix).
Number of parameter values.

briefdescription.para: Function (called by constructor) to set up the statePartialList_ member from the state derivative partials.

detaileddescription.para: Function (called by constructor) to set up the functions to evaluate the partial derivatives of the state derivatives w.r.t. a current state (stored in the statePartialList_ member) from the state derivative partials.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::map< int, std::shared_ptr< estimatable_parameters::EstimatableParameter< CurrentParameterType > > > &parameterList, const std::shared_ptr< orbit_determination::StateDerivativePartial > partialObject, std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void(Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd >) > > &functionListOfBody, const int totalParameterVectorIndicesToSubtract=0)
memberdef.name: addParameterPartialToList

param.type: std::multimap< std::pair< int, int >, std::function< void(Eigen::Block< Eigen::MatrixXd >) >

briefdescription.para: Function to add parameter partial functions for single state derivative model, and set of parameter objects.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to add parameter partial functions for single state derivative model, and set of parameter objects. Partial derivative functions that are not-empty are added to the functionListOfBody input (returned by reference). A list of parameters of a single type (double or vector) are handled a single function call.
parameterList
Map of parameters for which partial functions are to checked and created. Map keys are start entry of parameter in total parameter vector.
partialObject
State derivative partial object from which partial functions are to be retrieved.
functionListOfBody
Multimap of partial derivative functions to which entries are to be added by this function. Map key is start index and size of given parameter in sensitivity matrix. Map value is partial function.
totalParameterVectorIndicesToSubtract
Number of entries by which to shift start index in sensitivity matrix from entry in parameter vector (used for multi-arc estimation).

briefdescription.para: This function creates the list of partial derivatives of the state w.r.t. parameter values.

detaileddescription.para:
This function creates the list of partial derivatives of the state w.r.t. parameter values. The function is called once by the constructor and the resulting functions are set as member variables. This prevents having to check whether an acceleration model depends on every parameter during every time step.
parametersToEstimate
Object containing all parameters that are to be estimated and their current settings and values.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< estimatable_parameters::EstimatableParameterSet< ParameterType > > parametersToEstimate, const int currentArcIndex=-1)
memberdef.name: setTranslationalStatePartialFrameScalingFunctions

briefdescription.para: Function called by constructor to handle estimation of hierarchical translational dynamics.

detaileddescription.para:
Function called by constructor to handle estimation of hierarchical translational dynamics, i.e. where the state of body A is estimated w.r.t. body B, and body B is itself estimated w.r.t. to some third body (or inertial point) C.
parametersToEstimate
Total list of parameters to estimate.
currentArcIndex
Index of current arc (-1 if not multi-arc)

briefdescription.para: Function that sets the pre-multipliers for angular acceleration partial derivatives.

detaileddescription.para:
Function that sets the pre-multipliers for angular acceleration partial derivatives
parametersToEstimate
Total list of parameters to estimate.

briefdescription.para: Class from which the variational equations can be evaluated.

detaileddescription.para: Class from which the variational equations can be evaluated. The time derivative of the state transition and sensitivity matrices are computed from a set of state derivative partials objects, at the current time and state. This class performs all required bookkeeping to update, evaluate and combine these state derivative partials into the variational equations. The VariationalEquationsSolver object is used to manage and execute the full numerical integration of these variational equations and equations of motion.
